page.title: 03John Duggan an adult day.
page.content: My day starts at 5.15 am, by being woken up by the alarm clock. After having breakfast which usually consists of friut juice and cereal. I then set off for work by car to Merthyr, Tydfil by Taylor Woodrow at Trecatty Opencast coal mine as a fitter, and I start work at 6.30. I take sandwiches for my break which I have around 9.30. I arrive home from work around 4.30 pm. When the family will have a cooked meal. After dinner I will help wash the dinner dishes, do some gardening, take the dog for a walk, or do any jobs which need to be done around the house.
